meanings.definition: Lacking a definite or regular shape
meanings.sent1: The blob was shapeless and constantly changing.
meanings.sent2: The pile of clothes on the floor looked shapeless.
meanings.sent3: The shapeless cloud resembled a fluffy monster.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were a shapeless whirlwind of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The artist's canvas remained shapeless until the final brushstroke.

meanings.definition: Lacking a distinct form or outline
meanings.sent1: The shadow cast by the tree was shapeless in the dim light.
meanings.sent2: The figure in the fog appeared shapeless and mysterious.
meanings.sent3: The shapeless blob of dough turned into a delicious loaf of bread.
meanings.sent4: His memories of the event were a shapeless blur in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The shapeless mass of clay transformed into a beautiful sculpture.
